dist.description: The dist directory that should be read from and output to

buildScript.description: The name of the npm script that builds your TypeScript code

typingsFileExtension.description: The file extension for your typings files. Useful if you want to set `.cts` or `.mts`. If you forego adding a prefixing dot (`.`), it will be added for you.

external.description: Modules that should be considered as external. See https://rollupjs.org/guide/en/#warning-treating-module-as-external-dependency

noBuild.description: When enabled (default: false) the build step will not be called. Useful if you want to only bundle types and handle building yourself.

noClean.description: When enabled (default: false) the clean step will not be called. Useful if you want to only bundle types and handle cleaning yourself.

onlyBundle.description: A shortcut to enabling both `--no-build` and `--no-clean`. This essentially makes it so rollup-type-bundler only deals with bundling types and nothing else.
